title: Alchemist card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a bubbling flask left on a laboratory workbench.}} Drawing the Alchemist card restores some [[HP]] (and occasionally [[MP]]) in exchange for [[gold]]. The amount of healing and gold spent depends on the power level: *Power level 0 **80% chance that it will spend 0-66 gold to restore 0-33 HP **20% chance that it will spend 0-99 gold to restore 0-33 HP and 0-6 MP *Power level 1 **60% chance that it will spend 0-132 gold to restore 0-66 HP **40% chance that it will spend 0-198 gold to restore 0-66 HP and 0-13 MP *Power level 2 **40% chance that it will spend 0-198 gold to restore 0-99 HP **60% chance that it will spend 0-297 gold to restore 0-99 HP and 0-19 MP {{crawlquote|"You feel better. Some of your gold vanishes!"}} The amount of gold spent is directly proportional to the amount of healing the player receives.
